models.avenueKpis: Aggregated statistics showing mention distribution across different channels and sources (Social, Keywords, Reviews, Broadcast, News). Each avenue can be expanded to show sub-avenue breakdowns.
models.mentions: Individual conversations about the brand captured from social media, web, or surveys. Each mention is enriched with AI-powered sentiment, intent, and custom classifications.
models.authors: Customer social media identities who created the mentions. Each author has influence metrics and can be linked to a unified Contact profile.
models.contacts: Unified customer profiles that link multiple Author identities together, matched by email or phone number.
models.trendingKeywords: Popular hashtags, keywords, and phrases appearing frequently in recent mentions.
models.topAuthors: Most active or influential authors based on mention volume, reach, or engagement metrics.
models.savedViews: User-created view configurations that save display mode (Card/Table/Feed), filters, and column layouts for reuse.

relationships: Each Mention is created by an Author and comes from a specific Page within a Channel
Authors link to Contacts to create a unified customer view across platforms
Mentions can be associated with Location Profiles and Product Profiles
Avenue KPIs aggregate mention counts and sentiment across channels and sources
Saved Views capture user preferences for how to display and filter mentions

mentions.content: Comprehensive review: I've been a regular at Locobuzz CX for 3 months now. The coffee quality is consistently excellent - they clearly take their sourcing seriously. Atmosphere is modern and conducive to work. Only minor complaint is occasional inconsistency in foam art, but that's really nitpicking. Highly recommend for remote workers. 4.5/5 stars.
mentions.contentSnippet: Comprehensive review: I've been a regular at Locobuzz CX for 3 months now.
